name.baseName: Production stage ; oil ; water drive production, chemical drive oil increase production, heavy oil production
开采阶段;石油;水驱产量、化学驱增油产量、稠油产量

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The oil extraction processes described are employed for the extraction of crude oil from the LS oilfield. These methods include water flooding to enhance recovery rates (water drive production), the use of chemicals to improve oil recovery (chemical drive oil increase production), and the extraction of viscous heavy crude oil (heavy oil production). The extracted crude oil may be refined and utilized for various applications including energy production, manufacturing of petrochemicals, and as a raw material in the production of fuels, plastics, and other synthetic materials.
所描述的开采阶段包括采用三种方法从LS油田中提取原油：一是通过注水方法提高采收率（水驱产量），二是使用化学方法进一步提高采油效率（化学驱增油产量），三是开采粘稠的重油（稠油产量）。提取出的原油可进行精炼，用于能源生产、石油化工产品制造，以及作为生产燃料、塑料和其他合成材料的原料。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The literature known as LS oilfield is not specified
文献中代称为LS油田未进行具体说明

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: Oil and gas field development scheme is the basis of oil and gas field development process, and development scheme is the design of oil and gas field development method. It generally includes the geological research and engineering design of the reservoir, the design of the drilling project, the design of the oil production project, the design of the ground construction project, and the decision of the optimization of the program economy is usually included. After the design of the development scheme, it is usually necessary to adjust the development scheme appropriately and reasonably with the continuous progress of the development work. For different oil and gas fields, the development plan is also different. There are usually great differences in the design of development mode, well pattern layout and annual output of oil field. This is because the geological conditions of each oilfield are different, the original formation pressure and formation water energy of the oilfield are large and small, and the physical properties of the formation pore fluid may also be different.For some specific oil and gas fields with complex geological conditions, a rapid exploration method, namely rolling exploration and development, is usually proposed to simplify evaluation and exploration and accelerate the capacity construction of new oil fields. The so-called rolling exploration and development is a working method that takes overall control from the evaluation and exploration stage of oil and gas fields to the full-scale development stage, explores one piece and mines one piece, "exploration has development, development has exploration", and exploration and development are closely combined and cross-carried out.

油气田开发方案是油气田的开发过程的基础，开发方案是对油气田开发方法的设计。一般包括油藏的地质研究与工程设计、钻井工程的设计、采油工程的设计、地面建设工程的设计等内容，另外对方案经济优化的决策通常也包括在内。在设计开发方案之后，通常要随着开发工作的不断进展而对开发方案进行适当合理地调整。对于不同的油气田，采用的开发方案也不同。通常在开发方式的设计、井网布置的设计以及油田年产量的设计上差别较大。这是因为各个油田的地质情况有所不同，油田的原始地层压力以及地层水等能量有大有小，并且地层孔隙流体的物理性质也可能存在差异。针对一些特定的地质条件复杂的油气田，通常会提出一种简化评价勘探、用来加速新油田产能建设的快速勘探方法，即滚动勘探开发。所谓滚动勘探开发，就是从油气田的评价勘探阶段到全面投入开发阶段，采取整体控制，勘探一块，开采一块，“勘探中有开发，开发中有勘探”，勘探开发紧密结合、交叉进行的一种工作方法20。
technology.technologicalApplicability: The oil extraction processes described are employed for the extraction of crude oil from the LS oilfield. These methods include water flooding to enhance recovery rates (water drive production), the use of chemicals to improve oil recovery (chemical drive oil increase production), and the extraction of viscous heavy crude oil (heavy oil production). The extracted crude oil may be refined and utilized for various applications including energy production, manufacturing of petrochemicals, and as a raw material in the production of fuels, plastics, and other synthetic materials.
所描述的开采阶段包括采用三种方法从LS油田中提取原油：一是通过注水方法提高采收率（水驱产量），二是使用化学方法进一步提高采油效率（化学驱增油产量），三是开采粘稠的重油（稠油产量）。提取出的原油可进行精炼，用于能源生产、石油化工产品制造，以及作为生产燃料、塑料和其他合成材料的原料。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 鞠小玉. 石油勘探开发投入产出优化研究——以LS油田为例 [D].中国石油大学(华东),2016.
鞠小玉. 石油勘探开发投入产出优化研究——以LS油田为例 [D].中国石油大学(华东),2016.

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this data, users must note that the specifics of the individual process at the LS oilfield are not detailed in the referenced literature. Aspects such as the efficiency, technological advancement, and environmental impacts of the extraction processes may vary and are not accounted for. Users should apply this data cautiously and may need to consult additional sources or conduct a site-specific assessment for accurate modelling and evaluation within a Life Cycle Assessment framework. Pay particular attention to assumptions made regarding the extraction efficiency and secondary data relevance when incorporating this data into broader environmental studies.
使用此数据时，用户需注意，所参考的文献中并未详述LS油田的具体开采过程。开采过程的效率、技术进步和环境影响可能存在差异，且在文献中未被考虑。用户应谨慎应用此数据，并可能需要咨询其他资料来源或进行现场特定评估，以便在生命周期评价框架内进行准确的建模和评估。在将此数据纳入更广泛环境研究时，应特别注意关于提取效率的假设及二次数据的相关性。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

Total chemical flooding oil production from 2003 to 2012
Total heavy oil production from 2003 to 2012
